Awaken Tomb Oracle

Summon Commander:#1476 Tomb Oracle
When one of the ancient Oracles dies, it is mummified and buried in a tomb under the Hall of the Oracles. The dead Oracles can be awakened as living dead with the help of necromantic rituals. These reawakened Oracles are known as Tomb Oracles and are both powerful mages and priests.
